title: Can You Still Get a Netflix Subscription For Free?

steps.title: Netflix no longer offers a 1-month free trial[1] X Research source .
steps.content: Netflix no longer offers a 1-month free trial [1] X Research source . While offered in the past, this promotion no longer exists. Some companies and providers offer a package that may include a Netflix subscription. Verizon has offered a 12-month Netflix subscription promotion in the past, but it has since expired. [2] X Research source T-Mobile offers Netflix On Us , which includes a Netflix subscription along with a phone plan at no extra cost. Keep an eye out for other deals and promotions linked to services you already own or plan to purchase. Currently, a Basic subscription with ads costs $6.99/month. Unlike Amazon Prime , Netflix does not offer a discounted student subscription. [3] X Research source You can always share Netflix with a friend, watch movies on FaceTime , or even stream Netflix to watch together.

steps.title: T-Mobile.
steps.content: T-Mobile. Most Go5G, Magenta, and Magenta Max plans with T-Mobile allow you to add a Standard or Basic Netflix account for free. If you have a qualifying plan (it will be outlined in your plan details), log into your account online or in the app, then go to Account > Add-ons > Manage Data & Add-ons > Services , and select Netflix . [4] X Research source

steps.title: Verizon.
steps.content: Verizon. If you subscribe to Max for $10/mo, you can get Netflix for free. You can add this bundle to your Verizon bill as long as you have Unlimited Welcome, Unlimited Plus, or Unlimited Ultimate.

steps.title: Xfinity.
steps.content: Xfinity. Some Comcast Xfinity customers can purchase a subscription bundle that includes Netflix for free. This is only available in specific markets, so not every Xfinity customer can get this bundle. You should see the Netflix bundle on your bill if you're able to get it. [5] X Research source
